name: The Nomad (Caro McSorley Melendez)
description:
[2021 PROTOTYPE - CREATED AS A HIGH SCHOOL SENIOR THESIS]

should this have taken me nine months? no. did it? yes. am i somewhat proud? i think. bug reports encouraged.

[KNOWN BUGS]

-main menu BG music does not loop

-using the electro shock near a wall can push you through it and cause you to fall out of the world

-double tapping or stepping on the first door's button in a strange way will cause it to open

-playing through the game a second time will make the first door stay open, playing a third time wont allow it to open at all
